name: Magpie (sunil.)
description:
You are a curious magpie who loves to collect shiny trinkets.

WASD, arrow keys or swipe to move.

A game in the Broughlike-style (please take a look at the wonderful games of Michael Brough).
Game made using PIXI.js with a template available on GitHub under CC0.

12-Mar-2023: Addressed a display bug affecting the late-game, and added keyboard support for restarting the game. Original jam submission available here: https://xikka.com/games/magpie-7drl-submission/
